mapper.select: select a.goods_category_id, a.sort, a.back_rate, a.zk_rate, a.name from tb_goods_category a where a.store_id=#{store_id} and a.category_parent_id != '0' and a.deletestatus='0' order by a.sort
select a.goods_category_id, a.sort, a.back_rate, a.zk_rate, a.name from tb_goods_category a where a.store_id=#{store_id} and a.category_parent_id = '0' and a.deletestatus='0' order by a.sort

select a.goods_category_id, ifnull(a.goods_name,"") goods_name, ifnull(a.image_url,"") image_url, ifnull(a.market_money,"") market_money, ifnull(a.retail_money,"") retail_money, ifnull(a.integral_rate,"") integral_rate, ifnull(a.stock_number,"") stock_number, ifnull(a.consumption_number,"") consumption_number, ifnull(a.goods_status,"") goods_status, ifnull(a.sales_status,"") sales_status, ifnull(a.starttime,"") starttime, ifnull(a.endtime,"") endtime, ifnull(a.promotion_type,"") promotion_type, ifnull(a.company,"") company, a.goods_id from tb_goods a right join tb_goods_tj d on d.goods_id=a.goods_id where a.store_id=#{store_id} and a.deletestatus='0' and a.goods_status != '1' order by cast(a.retail_money as decimal(10,2)) limit 0,10

select a.goods_category_id, ifnull(a.goods_name,"") goods_name, ifnull(a.image_url,"") image_url, ifnull(a.market_money,"") market_money, ifnull(a.retail_money,"") retail_money, ifnull(a.integral_rate,"") integral_rate, ifnull(a.stock_number,"") stock_number, ifnull(a.consumption_number,"") consumption_number, ifnull(a.goods_status,"") goods_status, ifnull(a.sales_status,"") sales_status, ifnull(a.starttime,"") starttime, ifnull(a.endtime,"") endtime, ifnull(a.promotion_type,"") promotion_type, ifnull(a.company,"") company, a.goods_id from tb_goods a right join tb_goods_rq d on d.goods_id=a.goods_id where a.store_id=#{store_id} and a.deletestatus='0' and a.goods_status != '1' order by cast(a.retail_money as decimal(10,2)) limit 0,10

select a.goods_category_id, ifnull(a.goods_name,"") goods_name, ifnull(a.image_url,"") image_url, ifnull(a.market_money,"") market_money, ifnull(a.retail_money,"") retail_money, ifnull(a.integral_rate,"") integral_rate, ifnull(a.stock_number,"") stock_number, ifnull(a.consumption_number,"") consumption_number, ifnull(a.goods_status,"") goods_status, ifnull(a.sales_status,"") sales_status, ifnull(a.starttime,"") starttime, ifnull(a.endtime,"") endtime, ifnull(a.promotion_type,"") promotion_type, ifnull(a.starttime,"") starttime, ifnull(a.company,"") company, a.goods_id, b.name, b.sort from tb_goods a left join tb_goods_category b on a.goods_category_id=b.goods_category_id and b.store_id=#{store_id} where a.store_id=#{store_id} and a.deletestatus='0' and a.goods_status != '1' and a.goods_category_id=#{goods_category_id} order by cast(a.retail_money as decimal(10,2))

select a.goods_id, cast(a.price as decimal(10,2)) as price, ifnull(a.shop_number, '0' ) as shop_number, ifnull(a.goods_type, '1' ) as goods_type, a.order_id from tb_order_goods a where a.order_id=#{order_id}

select e.goods_category_id, e.name, e.back_rate , e.zk_rate from tb_goods c left join tb_goods_category d on c.goods_category_id=d.goods_category_id left join tb_goods_category e on e.goods_category_id=d.category_parent_id where c.goods_id=#{goods_id} and c.deletestatus='0'

select a.goods_category_id, ifnull(a.goods_name,"") goods_name, ifnull(a.image_url,"") image_url, ifnull(a.market_money,"") market_money, ifnull(a.retail_money,"") retail_money, ifnull(a.integral_rate,"") integral_rate, ifnull(a.stock_number,"10000") stock_number, ifnull(a.consumption_number,"0") consumption_number, ifnull(a.goods_status,"") goods_status, ifnull(a.sales_status,"") sales_status, date_format(ifnull(a.starttime,date_sub(now(),interval 1 day) ) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') starttime, date_format(ifnull(a.endtime,date_sub(now(),interval 1 day) ) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') endtime, ifnull(a.promotion_type,"") promotion_type, ifnull(a.promotion_content,"") promotion_content, a.store_id, a.goods_id from tb_goods a where a.goods_id=#{goods_id}
